name: sailing-texas-11ty
description: Sailing Texas - Your premier destination for buying and selling sailboats in Texas

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx wrangler pages deploy _site --project-name=sailing-texas-site --commit-dirty=true
scripts.deploy:create: npm run build && npx wrangler pages project create sailing-texas-site && npx wrangler pages deploy _site --project-name=sailing-texas-site --commit-dirty=true

author: Sailing Texas
